svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:62.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/62.0" version="9.1.2" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram id="0a0fe93a-53b6-9ef8-703b-3dc2eea49ae0" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 228px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: User publish valid in-flight transaction t and the bond

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Users can set input or output exitableby placing a bond

switch.text: Users can set input or output exitableby placing a bond

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: User may challenge inputs or outputs as spent

switch.text: User may challenge inputs or outputs as spent

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 175px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: User can provide remaining signatures of the transaction

switch.text: User can provide remaining signatures of the transaction

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 186px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: Users can present included spends of inputs of transaction t. Only oldest spend is taking into account and can get the bond.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 186px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Anyone can show, that t is included earlier then the oldest concurrent spend

switch.text: Anyone can show, that t is included earlier then the oldest concurrent spend

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 636px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.div: If all signatures provided, the transaction is the oldest of presented: unchallenged piggybacked outputs processed, bonds refunded.
Else: unchallenged piggybacked inputs processed, bonds refunded.
